rules_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it.)[/i]
When Descent through the Abyss enters the battlefield and whenever a defense counter is removed from it, it deals 1 damage to any target you don’t control, then you journey into the Underworld. [i](Enter the Underworld if you haven’t already, then put a damnation counter on it.)[/i]
